title: manu.ninja
description: manu.ninja is the personal blog of Manuel Wieser. Jekyll, then Gatsby.

title: vue-cli-plugin-e2e-nightwatch-cucumber
description: Nightwatch/Cucumber plugin for Vue CLI 3.

title: Corsair
description: Corsair using RxJS, Immutable.js and WebGL/three.js.

title: RxJS Breakout
description: Breakout using Functional Reactive Programming and RxJS.

title: Dominant Colors Lazy Loading (WordPress Plugin)
description: This WordPress plugin allows you to lazy-load your images while showing the dominant color of each image as a placeholder – like Pinterest or Google Images.

title: gatsby-source-buttercms
description: Source plugin for pulling blog posts, authors, categories, tags, and content fields into Gatsby from ButterCMS.

title: snow.js️
description: snow.js is a module that exports a snow() function, which you can pass the number of snowflakes you'd like and an HTML element where they should be drawn.

title: Japanese Phrasebook️
description: 100% free Japanese Phrasebook app, built for travel and offline usage. Add it to your Home screen and access 670+ essential phrases in 19 topics. Requires no Internet connection and offers speech synthesis, so you know how to pronounce Japanese phrases correctly.

title: vue-dictaphone
description: Vue.js dictaphone component to record audio from the user.

title: WebGL Examples️
description: Essential WebGL examples, adapted from MDN and Learning WebGL.

title: Johannes
description: Prototype for a collaborative real-time presentation software, meant as a self-hosted alternative to Google Slides. Built during a 24-hour hackathon in a team of three people using Firebase, Preact, TypeScript and Feathers.

title: Animation Strip Generator (GUI)
description: Simple Electron app providing a GUI for a command-line utility.

title: Animation Strip Generator
description: A command-line utility for creating sprite animations from image sequences.

title: Laravel Handlebars
description: A Laravel 5 wrapper for LightnCandy for using the Handlebars (and Mustache) template engine. It allows you to use the same templates in different languages (like PHP and JavaScript) on the client and server.

title: WebGL 3D Model Viewer Using three.js
description: three.js example using an OBJ/MTL loader, orbit controls, nearest-neighbor filtering and a pure white ambient light to showcase pixel art textures.

title: ARTUR Web Interface
description: ARTUR (Autonomous Robot Playspace) is a game designed for the Deep Space 8K at Ars Electronica Center. It made its debut at the Ars Electronica Festival 2017 in Linz, Austria. The web interface allows visitors to take part in the game by spawning new items for the players.

title: Hacker News with Vue.js and GraphQL
description: Example project for my lectures showing how to use Vue.js core libraries and tooling with GraphQL. A companion project sets up a serverless GraphQL backend via Graphcool.

title: grunt-svg-symbols
description: Grunt plugin to generate an SVG icon system (based on <symbol>) of a specified folder.

title: Web Push Notifications
description: A complete example on how to send push notifications, using Service Workers, Notification API, Push API and Google’s and Mozilla’s push messaging services.

title: resemble-image
description: Provide color stops for a gradient that loosely resembles the original image. This package only contains the basic algorithms to use in any JavaScript application.

title: postcss-resemble-image
description: Provide color stops for a gradient that loosely resembles the original image.

title: dominant-colors-snippets
description: Snippets showcasing the differences between quantization techniques.

title: Clock Clock 24
description: A take on the original design by Humans since 1982, where 24 analogue clocks form a digital clock.

title: Liquid Loading
description: A “droplet effect” pull-to-refresh animation using SVG, CSS and JavaScript.

title: WebGL Annotations
description: three.js example showing how to add a comment box or annotation box to a WebGL object as seen on Sketchfab.

title: Clementine
description: Radiated Pixel’s Clementine, the skill-based brain-twisting platformer, on iOS, Android or Windows Phone. Can you run further than your friends and beat their high scores?! The microsite lists all-time high scores of players.
